definitions.definition: At the same time, in the same place; in close association or proximity.
Into one place; into a single thing; combined.
definitions.example: He put all the parts together.

definitions.definition: In a relationship or partnership, for example a business relationship or a romantic partnership.
definitions.example: Bob and Andy went into business together.  Jenny and Mark have been together since they went on holiday to Mexico.

definitions.definition: Without intermission or interruption; continuously; uninterruptedly.
definitions.example: It has been raining four days together
